Articles.Content: I have being trying to download the shuttle mod off the mod page on the forum but every time I click the download button it takes me back to the home page. please could someone help me with this.

If you could link to the specific post it would help with redirecting you, just searching for "shuttle mod" brings back hundreds of results :>

you could try these ones..

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/8428-Component-Space-Shuttle-%28CSS%29-v0-3-1-%28April-06-2012%29?highlight=shuttle

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/10380-Valkyrie-Project?highlight=shuttle

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/12830-Put-this-shuttle-into-orbit-and-get-it-back-safely%21?highlight=shuttle

thank you for the links really helped but still having trouble downloading for instance the mechjeb plugin just wont download it just keeps redirecting me to the homepage, sorry for being a pain but new to all of this
If you could post a link to to the page you are having issues downloading from and the post number, it would be appreciated.
